title: Do you need a degree to work in tech?
description: Big tech firms like IBM are no longer asking for degrees when hiring staff.

title: Artificial Intelligence police van detects drivers using mobile phones
description: The van found 86 drivers suspected of using a phone and 273 people not wearing a seat belt.

title: Hollywood writers fear losing work to AI
description: US movie and TV writers have been on strike since May with artificial intelligence a core issue.
